Package path_simulation

Class PathSimulation

  • java.lang.Object
    • path_simulation.AbsSimulation
      • path_simulation.PathSimulation
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Simulation

    public class PathSimulation
extends AbsSimulation
    Path Simulator. Includes the Pending Event Container, current time and simulation time and the population of individuals
    Author:
    Joao,Sara

        Stop simulation: Not Implemented

      • initInd

        void initInd​(Individual ind)
        Initialization of an Individual. Sets a time for its death and may create new events related to it. New Individual is also added to the population.
        Parameters:
        ind - Individual to be initialized

      • expRandom

        double expRandom​(double mean)
        Method that returns a random variable between two numbers, according to some time constants
        Parameters:
        mean - Mean of the distribution
        Returns:
        Random variable according to an exponential distribution with a mean defined by the mean parameter

      • setComfort

        double setComfort​(Individual ind)
        Method that sets the comfort of an Individual
        Parameters:

        Returns:
        The comfort value of an Individual

      • calcMean

        double calcMean​(double comf,
                int p)
        Calculate mean to generate time for an Event
        Parameters:
        comf - Comfort Sens
        p - Parameter related to the probability of the different Events
        Returns:
        Mean to be applied in an Exponential distribution, to calculate the time of occurence of an Event

      • setTime

        double setTime​(Individual ind,
               int p)
        Create random time value for new Event
        Parameters:
        ind - Individual in which the event is to be performed
        p - Event parameter
        Returns:
        Time of occurence of the Event
